mention.text: the department that condoned racism and brutality. ; The report `` deals with management issues , not directly with the chief of police , '' the source said.

Gates -- who said he would resign if the commission agreed with his critics that he created a climate within the department that condoned racism and brutality. ; The report `` deals with management issues , not directly with the chief of police , '' the source said.
The commission , appointed by Gates and Bradley
the March 3 nightstick beating of Rodney G. King
transcripts of computer messages that one of the officers at the scene sent to a another officer
as many as a dozen black police officers
five civilians appointed by the mayor.
